title: Update Contact Email Address
description: A customer needs to update the primary email address used for notifications and billing.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Take the new email address from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly records the new email address.

tasks.description: Update the contact email in the customer's profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the email address in the CRM.

tasks.description: Send a verification email to the new address to complete the process.
